controls.message: If changing the presets after customizing settings - you may need to manually remove/reset those variables in yaml code editor to correctly reset the card.
Slider control functionality is disabled for unsupported entity types.  The sliders for these entities will be in display-only mode.

You can try the 'Attribute' selector to select a specific attribute of the entity to display.  The list of attributes has been filtered down to those that can parse to a number.  If not selected, the card will use the state of the entity.
